overview:
Mitchell Richler is currently the CEO and co-founder of the YellowHammer Media Group.

Before that, he was a Senior Vice President at the Epic Media Group (formerly Azoogle). In this role, Mitchell oversaw all areas of publisher distribution and was responsible for the continued growth and development of the company’s strategic publisher relationships. In his tenure at Epic, Mitchell held numerous leadership positions within the organization. His contribution to the overall development and relationship management of the company’s largest publishers was a key driver in its continued impressive growth over the last 4 years.
